name: Intelligence: Dinosaurs
description: Is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with dinosaurs) in such a way - that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 90 MB available space
